text: On the Path () is a 2010 Bosnian Austrian German Croatian drama movie directed by Jasmila Žbanić and starring Zrinka Cvitešić, Leon Lučev, Nina Violić, Mirjana Karanović. == Other websites == * Category:2010 drama movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Croatian movies Category:Movies directed by Jasmila Žbanić Category:Movies set in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: On the Path
